review: I purchased this produced so I could watch videos from my laptop.it seems the quality of viewing is not as good as viewing directly from the laptop.  The viewing was somewhat choppy and sometimes the action was ahead of the lips moving.I haven't used a whole lot so I will continue using to see if perhaps it was just my internet connection (which is always exceptionally fast) or if it is this product.
author: relm

review: I love this device, the picture quality is superb.  There is no buffering (stopping, starting) during my streaming movies.  The price at $35 is awesome!  My old Sony Blu-ray was driving me nuts whenever I was watching Netflix or Amazon Instant, sometimes having constant loading issues.  My chromecast works perfectly and I'm so glad I bought it!
author: L. Purvis "Mom in Virginia"

review: I love what it does. Got rid of cable/sat tv and just use hulu, netflix, plex now. 5 minute easy setup. Easy use. Rarely needs a reset. Minor drawback is that it requires additional power if you mounted your tv and not sure if it can use 5GHz band on my router. Overall its a solid 95 out of 100.
author: Amazon Customer
